name: underscores
description: Hi, I'm a starter theme called Underwind, which is a terrible name, but I'm a combination of Underscores and Tailwind. I'm a theme meant for hacking, so don't just use me as a Parent Theme. Instead, try turning me into the next, most awesome, WordPress theme out there. But mediocrity built at a reasonable pace is cool too. I won't judge. I grew up reading about a school bus taking children into space without any no permission slips or waivers, so yeah, I'm definitely not going to judge.
author: Automattic Theme Team

scripts.bundle: dir-archiver --src . --dest ../_s.zip --exclude .DS_Store .stylelintrc.json .eslintrc .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore README.md composer.json composer.lock node_modules vendor package-lock.json package.json .travis.yml phpcs.xml.dist sass style.css.map yarn.lock
